function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"30% of hospitalised cases requiring critical care","Impact":"Higher demand for critical care resources, increased mortality rate","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce the spread of the disease and prevent hospitalization","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring devices","People":"Patients in critical condition","Owner":"Healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Overall mean duration of hospitalisation of 10.4 days","Impact":"Strain on hospital resources and increased risk of transmission within healthcare settings","Mitigation":"Efficient discharge planning and implementation of infection control measures","Technologies":"Hospital management systems, infection control technologies","People":"Hospitalized patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Hospital management, healthcare administrators"},{"Description":"IFR estimates at 0.9% (95% credible interval 0.4%-1.4%)","Impact":"Uncertainty in mortality rates and public health planning","Mitigation":"Continuous monitoring and updating of IFR estimates based on evolving data","Technologies":"Data analytics, statistical modeling","People":"Public health officials, epidemiologists","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"}]}
